duties_responsibilities.duty: End-to-end ownership of program scope, planning, resource management, budget, risks, and progress against business outcomes.
Facilitate the prioritization of all work ensuring alignment to the strategic roadmap and manage the program backlog.
Develop program metrics, continually monitor and report progress to stakeholders and project team members.
Mentor team members in agile and scrum methodologies, promote best practices, and drive continuous improvement.
Coach and motivate project and product teams, provide status monitoring and reporting, and facilitate program and portfolio reviews.

education_certification.credential:
BA/BS in related degree or equivalent experience
15+ years’ experience in delivering software solutions.
Experience with SaaS a plus!
Experience with Finance Transformation in a SaaS company a plus!
PMI-ACP, CSM, PgMP, PMP or equivalent preferred
